actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to certify sites adjacent to the navigable waters of the United States which are suitable for the location of liquified natural gas storage terminals.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to certify sites adjacent to the navigable waters of the United States which are suitable from safety and environmental standpoints for the location of liquified natural gas storage terminals.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to certify sites adjacent to the navigable waters of the United States which are suitable for the location of liquified natural gas storage terminals.
